results.overview: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with the help of HAL 9000, the world's most advanced super computer.
results.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey

results.original_title: Short Cuts: "2001: L'Odyssée de l'Espace" de Stanley Kubrick
results.overview: Animated retelling of "2001: A Space Odyssey" by Stanley Kubrick in a short film by Zaven Najjar.
results.title: Short Cuts: Stanley Kubrick's "2001: A Space Odyssey"

results.original_title: A Primer for '2001: A Space Odyssey'
results.overview: Primer on the meaning, techniques and background of Stanley Kubrick's 1968 film "2001: A Space Odyssey." Keir Dullea, who starred in the film as astronaut Bowman, narrates on camera and over many excerpts from the film.
results.title: A Primer for '2001: A Space Odyssey'

results.original_title: '2001: A Space Odyssey' – A Look Behind the Future
results.overview: A short documentary about the making of Stanley Kubrick's 2001: A Space Odyssey and its impact on the '60s view of the future.
results.title: '2001: A Space Odyssey' – A Look Behind the Future

results.original_title: '2001: A Space Odyssey' – What Is Out There?
results.overview: Keir Dullea, interspersed with archive clips of Arthur C. Clarke, discusses the probability of extraterrestrial life.
results.title: '2001: A Space Odyssey' – What Is Out There?

results.original_title: The Killing of a Man Who Sleeps While Watching 2001: A Space Odyssey by The Angry Wife
results.overview: In the silence of the night, a wife found herself in a situation like the movie she was watching. Exploring the death of a relationship
results.title: The Killing of a Man Who Sleeps While Watching 2001: A Space Odyssey by The Angry Wife
